title: Mutual Non-Disclosure Agreement - Questionnaire
description: Create a mutual NDA to protect confidential information shared between two parties

governing_jurisdiction.title: Select Governing Law Jurisdiction
governing_jurisdiction.description: Choose the legal jurisdiction that will govern this agreement

party1_name.title: First Party Legal Name
party1_name.description: Full legal name of the first company or individual

party1_address.title: First Party Address
party1_address.description: Complete registered address of the first party

party1_jurisdiction.title: First Party Jurisdiction
party1_jurisdiction.description: Where is the first party incorporated or located? (e.g., 'Delaware', 'England and Wales')

party2_name.title: Second Party Legal Name
party2_name.description: Full legal name of the second company or individual

party2_address.title: Second Party Address
party2_address.description: Complete registered address of the second party

party2_jurisdiction.title: Second Party Jurisdiction
party2_jurisdiction.description: Where is the second party incorporated or located?

effective_date.title: Effective Date
effective_date.description: The date this agreement becomes effective

purpose.title: Purpose of Disclosure
purpose.description: Brief description of the business purpose (e.g., 'evaluating a potential partnership', 'merger discussions', 'joint venture exploration')

term_years.title: Confidentiality Period (Years)
term_years.description: How long should confidential information remain protected?

return_destruction_days.title: Days to Return/Destroy Materials
return_destruction_days.description: Time allowed for return or destruction of confidential materials after agreement ends

include_residuals_clause.title: Include Residuals Clause?
include_residuals_clause.description: Allows the receiving party to use general ideas/concepts retained in memory (without copying specific information). This is favorable to the receiving party.

include_non_solicit.title: Include Non-Solicitation Clause?
include_non_solicit.description: Prevents hiring of the other party's employees who were identified through this relationship

non_solicit_period_months.title: Non-Solicitation Period (Months)
non_solicit_period_months.description: Duration of non-solicitation restriction (only applicable if non-solicitation is included)

purpose.ui:placeholder: e.g., exploring a potential strategic partnership in the SaaS space

term_years.ui:help: Most NDAs use 2-5 years; sensitive information may warrant longer periods

non_solicit_period_months.ui:help: Note: Some jurisdictions restrict or prohibit non-solicitation clauses

term_reasonable.message: Terms longer than 5 years may be viewed as unreasonable in some jurisdictions
